content: this is a free crochet pattern to make an adorable turtle amigurumi pdf version of this pattern is available on my website this pattern can make the baby turtle and the mommy turtle the baby being smaller and the mommy being bigger the mommy turtle even has a starfish relaxing on her shell this pattern is very easy and quick it works great for scrap yarn supplies 4mm hook 6mm safety eyes black embroidery thread tapestry needle stuffing scissors yarn used for basic turtle green brown and orange let me know if you enjoy this patten and if you finished it please upload a picture in the projects section
